name: Orthrus
description: Orthrus is a Medium monstrosity with two canine heads and a serpent-like head, showcasing a mixture of canine and serpentine features.
memorable: Its three heads grant it unique advantages in perception and resilience to incapacitating conditions.
goals: To hunt and protect its territory while being alert during sleep.
relations: Related to other multi-headed monstrosities or canine creatures.
environment: Commonly found in wilderness areas where it can efficiently track its prey.
strengths: High Dexterity and Constitution enhance its agility and durability in combat.
weaknesses: Notably low Intelligence and Charisma limit its strategic and social interactions.
attacks: Performs Multiattack with three bite attacks, including potent poison effects from the snake head.
most_powerful_ability: Its 'Three-Headed' trait allows it advantage on Perception checks and resilience against many conditions.
senses: Enhanced senses with darkvision up to 120 feet and a passive perception score of 15, making it very aware of its surroundings.
skills: Skilled in perception and survival, showcasing proficiency in awareness and tracking.
additional_information: Can knock opponents prone with its canine head bites.
Maintains alertness even while resting due to the 'Wakeful' ability.
Effective in combat due to its multiple heads and size.
test_queries: two-headed canine creature with poison attack
serpent-like monster that can knock opponents down
agile creature with multiple heads and poison
multi-headed monstrosity that excels in awareness
canine and serpent hybrid that hunts efficiently
